messages.message: @Aaron Tami This is pretty cool. Can you also investigate what it will take to run this on an on-prem install? Quickly glanced through the setup and it is possible that on-prem install may require internet connectivity to connect with Azure https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/text-analytics/how-tos/text-analytics-how-to-install-containers
@Ashish We reached out to Microsoft and were initially denied access. Matt and Anant are following up with their connections at Msft to see if we can get access.
Ok. Thanks for the update! If we can get this running on on-prem, this will be an amazing add-on.
